tool_description: Lookup VIN by license plate and state | US license plate database
name: US License Plate to VIN
title: US License Plate to VIN

api_list.name: US License Plate to VIN
api_list.description: Lookup the full VIN from vehicle license plates. Support license plates across all 50 states in the USA. Supports cars, trucks, motorcycles, RVs, and more.

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: Needs to be two letter state abbreviations. For example: CA, NV
